channel.title: CVE Feed for The Beaver Builder Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Beaver Builder Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-36425|2024-08-03T10:07:33.116Z -- the%20beaver%20builder%20team -- beaver%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20page%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Broken Access Control vulnerability in Beaver Builder plugin <= 2.5.4.3 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-37500|2024-08-02T03:57:39.552Z -- the%20beaver%20builder%20team -- beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in The Beaver Builder Team Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Beaver Builder: from n/a through 2.8.2.2.
